title: Falling Edge Scope Capture (81h to 80h)
summary: Scope capture of a small falling-edge code step with LDAC feed-through and settling behavior.

structured_data.description: VOUT scale is 5 mV/div with LDAC trigger pulse at 5 V/div, time base 2 us/div, and external reference 2.5 V. Transition is from code 81h to 80h.
